titleStmt.title: Bellum grammaticale a discourse of great warand dissention betwene two worthy princes, the noune and the uerbe, contending for the chefe place or dignitie in oration : very pleasant & profitable / turned into English by W.H.
titleStmt.author: Guarna, Andrea.
Hayward, William, fl. 1570-1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henrie Bynneman, dwelling in Knightrider strete, at the signe of the Mermayde,

notesStmt.note: "First made in Latin by the learned Lord Andrew Guarna of Salerne, and after translated into French, and now ... turned into English"--P. [15].
Imperfect: tightly bound and slightly faded.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Knightrider strete, at the signe of the Mermayde
